channel.title: working on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in working on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-22
item.description: Apple Reportedly Completes Production Tests for AR/VR Headset (1 minute read) Apple has completed key production tests for its long-rumored augmented and virtual reality headset.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-17
item.description: Disney is developing planned communities for fans who never want to leave its clutches (3 minute read) Storyliving by Disney is a new part of the company’s theme park division that plans to develop a series of communities for residential living.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-24
item.description: Leak reveals Microsoft’s canceled Windows OS for dual-screen devices (2 minute read) Microsoft was working on a secret pocketable Surface device powered by a custom Windows OS before turning to Android for its Surface Duo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-18
item.description: The PinePhone Pro brings upgraded hardware to the Linux phone (3 minute read) Pine64 is now taking preorders for the PinePhone Pro, the fastest mainline Linux smartphone on the market.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-06
item.description: Google planning Apple-like integration between its products to compete (3 minute read) Google has announced plans to rival Apple’s ecosystem integration at CES 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-03
item.description: Google is making its first in-house smartwatch that could launch in 2022 (3 minute read) Google could be launching its first smartwatch in 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-29
item.description: Apple still working on multi-device charger, a future where all devices ‘can charge each other’ (2 minute read) Apple is working on a multi-device charger for its products as well as short and long-distance wireless charging.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-16
item.description: How to Watch the World’s First All-Civilian Spaceflight Aboard a SpaceX Ship (3 minute read) Inspiration4 is set to launch on September 15.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-15
item.description: Facebook Working on Smart Watch to Compete With Apple Watch (2 minute read) Facebook is working on a smart watch that will work without a tethered smartphone.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-28
item.description: SpaceX Starlink public beta begins (2 minute read) SpaceX has started to send email invitations to Starlink’s public beta.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-22
item.description: Microsoft purchases Bethesda Softworks in industry-changing acquisition (3 minute read) Microsoft has announced that it is buying the corporate parents of Bethesda Softworks, ZeniMax Media.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-28
item.description: Google will keep employees working remotely until July 2021 (1 minute read) Google will keep its 200,000 full-time and contract employees working remotely until at least July 2021.
